column4: is there a channel for PDA's in ubuntu
- this one, I have a couple sso ask
- did you have a PDA+Ubuntu related question?
when i try to connect my palm tungsten e2 to ubuntu, i get PPP timeout
i could try the cable i suppose
- what are you running on the e2?
im trying to connect to the wbe

- OK fair enough, I havent actually played with bluetooth under linux as all my PDA's less one (an e2 as it happens) are WIFI Capable, the e2 runs familiar linux, so there is no working bluetooth on it for me to play with att... I can guess what you would need to do as far as the connection is concerned, however.. - have you had a look at the various how-too things on the web (there is a lot out there for linux and the tungsten
- sorry for not being more help :)
